articles.title: Xi Jinping to skip G20 summit in India, western officials say - Financial Times
articles.description: Chinese president’s absence viewed as setback for divided forum and for host Narendra Modi
articles.content:
Chinas president Xi Jinping is not planning to attend the G20 summit in New Delhi next weekend, officials said, in a blow to a forum of leading nations already beset by deep divisions.

articles.title: Southampton: Boys who smoke risk passing on damaged genes - BBC
articles.description: Their children risk developing obesity and lung problems, say University of Southampton scientists.
articles.content:
Boys who smoke in their early teens risk passing on damaged genes to their own children, new research has found.
